Uses of Package
thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers

Packages that use thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers
thothbot.parallax.core.client Contains code which can be run on the client side only. 
thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers Here is located WebGL renderer. 
thothbot.parallax.core.client.shader Here are all shaders and shader's related code. 
thothbot.parallax.core.client.widget Here are widgets which used by RenderingPanel. 
thothbot.parallax.core.shared.cameras Different cameras which are used by renderer. 
thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects Here are all Geometric Objects used in the Scene. 
 

Classes in thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers used by thothbot.parallax.core.client
WebGLRenderer
          The WebGL renderer displays your beautifully crafted Scenes using WebGL, if your device supports it.
WebGLRenderer.PRECISION
          Sets the Shaders precision value.
 

Classes in thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers used by thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers
WebGLRenderer.PRECISION
          Sets the Shaders precision value.
WebGLRenderInfo
          Th class with a series of statistical information about the graphics board memory and the rendering process.
WebGLRenderInfo.WebGLRenderInfoMemory
          Information about used memory in the graphic card.
WebGLRenderInfo.WebGLRenderInfoRender
          Information about rendering primitives.
WebGLRenderInfo.WebGLRenderTimer
          Information about duration for some procedures.
WebGLRenderLights.WebGLRenderLightsDirectional
